comments: The row polynomial pFo(m,x) := sum(a(m,k)*x^k,k=0..m) is the numerator of the g.f. for the m-th column sequence of A060921, the odd part of the bisected Fibonacci triangle.
formula: a(n, m)= coefficient of x^m of ((1-x+sqrt(x))^(n+1) - (1-x-sqrt(x))^(n+1))/(2*sqrt(x)).a(n, m)= sum(((-1)^(m-j))*binomial(n+1, 2*j+1)*binomial(n-2*j, m-j), j=0..m), if 0<= m <= floor(n/2); a(n, m) := ((-1)^n)*a(n, n-m) if floor(n/2) < m <= n; else 0.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
